text_block_list.text: WAAAAAH!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Gasp! Someone's in trouble!That voice came from the schoolgates—let's go!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
WAAAH! No... No! You're scaring me,<n>Nature! Don't come
any closer!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, I'm not scary at all!<n>Come here... so I can
cover you in<n>mud too!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: WAAAH! It's a monster! Go away!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
What're those two up to? And, uh,<n>why's Nature all caked
in mud?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Did Turbo prank her? Or, like, maybe<n>they're having a mud
party! I lowkey<n>wanna try that. ☆

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ooh, a mud party, huh? I heard<n>they're all the rage right
now! Well... I<n>think I did anyway. Maybe?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Real talk though—it looks super lit.<n>C'mon! Let's get dirty!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Sounds good! I'm in!

text_block_list.name: Helios and Palmer
text_block_list.text: Sup, Nature! Wahey! ☆

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Nobody invited you!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Um... What do you think is going on?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I haven't got a clue. But we should<n>probably call someone
just in case—
SLAM!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
So this is where you've all been... I<n>thought I told you to
meet for a joint<n>training session after cleaning.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Geez, Ikuno, you had me shook!<n>Those were some serious
decibels for<n>just slamming your book. Talk about<n>a literal
clapback! ☆

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Daitaku Helios. Mejiro Palmer. I<n>believe the two of you
were assigned<n>to cleaning duty for skipping classes<n>and
playing around.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Well, I didn't want to ditch class.I was just feeling different that dayand didn't wanna kill the vibe, yaknow? ☆

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Geez, you guys are hopeless. Guess<n>I'll have to show you
how to act right!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Ahem... Twin Turbo. You, too, were<n>given cleaning duty as
punishment for<n>running around the room during class,<n>
were you not?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: That wasn't a punishment! Thevice president just asked me to "tryand calm down."

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Is that so? Then I apologize. As for<n>you, Nice Nature...

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: ...Hm? Why are you here again?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I want someone to tell me that...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Ooh—I understand now, Dia! It's a<n>skit! They must be
practicing a<n>comedy routine!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Ah, that makes sense! Where's my<n>coin purse? I want to
support them.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: This isn't a skit! Wait... Huh? You<n>two...

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: B-b-boom! Kita and Sato, mad propson the cleanup job aaand forjoining the academy! Time for awelcome party—wahey! ☆

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Waheeey! Thank youuu!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: A party? Really?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Certainly, a celebration would help<n>ease the tension of
entering an<n>unfamiliar environment. I agree with<n>Helios,
actually.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Guess you really can't judge a book<n>by its cover, huh?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much for going out of<n>your way for us!
You're all so kind!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry for any trouble that Turbo<n>and the others may
have caused.<n>Incidentally, what were you two doing<n>back
there?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Ah. Um... Well, actually, we also got<n>assigned cleaning duty
as a<n>punishment. Ahaha...

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Seriously? That makes us, like, total<n>"prison pals." PPs for
life! Woohoo! ♪

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: So what did you do? Throw a BBQ inthe schoolyard? Or maybe askateboarding contest in the hallway?You're unhinged!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Er...

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: No, no! They were definitely buildingan ocean! I mean, Golshi wasmaking waves earlier!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Or maybe they got sucked into one of<n>Marvelous's
schemes. You two<n>okay? Do you feel like your normal<n>
selves?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Eeeep!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Haha, don't scare them, Nature.<n>Don't worry, you two. Not
all of us<n>here are such wild characters.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Oh, Palmer! Thank goodness at leastsomebody here is normal!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh, please. Normal's the last word I'd<n>use for Little Miss
Mejiro Princess<n>here.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! Mejiro?! Then you're from the<n>same family as
McQueen?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
But wait, there's more! Palmz is the<n>explosive runaway pro,
the front<n>running goddess! My super runaway<n>bestie! ☆

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
A-a goddess?! Tracen Academy<n>really is incredible. The
Umamusume<n>here are literally out of this world!
Hmm... What should I do?
